before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"2fovr","text":"Absolute Ethanol (100% = 200 proof) at -80o C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":42,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bg7es","text":"70% ethanol at -80o C (don’t cool ethanol for too long or water will freeze)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":18,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c419c","text":"Tabletop centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2i8nc","text":"-80°C freezer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8c7hq","text":"This protocol is for a simple ethanol precipitation of small fragments and/or small amounts of DNA. Note that this protocol simply concentrates your sample and removes enough salts/enzymes for ligation to be successful. All DNA fragments from your digest will still be present in your pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr8ub","text":" See here for a discussion of theory behind ethanol precipitation of DNA fragments.\n ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":4}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E55231BF9DE84577826356911731C8C2","url":"http://www.protocol-online.org/biology-forums/posts/20466.html"}}}}

groups.title: SoWa RI Anaerobic and Molecular Microbiology (public)

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"ft74o","text":"3M Sodium Acetate, 0.11M MgCl2 pH 5.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":37},{"style":"sub","offset":29,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e4v2m","text":"24.6 g sodium acetate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dk1oc","text":"0.952g MgCl2 anhydrous","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":11,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5c2fu","text":"Dissolve in about 60 ml DDW Adjust pH with glacial acetic acid (\u003e8 ml), Dilute to 100 ml with DDW and filter sterilize.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8turb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aqqqs","text":"Adjust the salt conc. of the sample to 0.3M sodium acetate and 0.01M MgCl2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":73,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"18pdh","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9rvf5","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.3","guid":"DA18F2125EF4439B926FA1097D98C461","id":"221","label":"sodium acetate","unit":"21"}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.01","guid":"EAB6DF80129243C1A7337D16289BA569","id":"222","label":"MgCl2","unit":"21"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed6u2","text":"Add 1 µl of Pellet Paint NF.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"77a22","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"rj8v","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"7215F80A14714FA3AACAE1A6D70E8EAA","id":"6654","label":"Pellet Paint NF","unit":"1"}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"_public":"","guid":"4199B474341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":"","name":"Pellet Paint® NF Co-Precipitant","reagent_vendor_link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","sku":"70748-3","url":"https://www.sigmaaldrich.com/catalog/product/mm/70748?lang=en\u0026region=CZ","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"badges":[],"id":17,"image":{"placeholder":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"https://stage.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"link":"http://sigmaaldrich.com","name":"Sigma Aldrich","username":null}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cntk","text":"Add 1 µl of non labeled genomic DNA e.g. from E.coli (this acts as a carrier and increases precipitation yield).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fodhi","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"7E50FE19FF0B43F4A2AEE376966C7EF6","id":"6655","label":"genomic DNA (E.coli)","unit":"1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41u1r","text":"Incubate 2-3 hr at -80°C.  The long incubation time is critical for small fragments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eko93","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"derss","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"84758C5E85904FA58C410DB9A0FC0461","id":"1316","label":"","temperature":"-80","unit":"10"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"7200","guid":"CFD3A96AB56046D8A4C3DA2587E7E189","id":"15646","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apnfj","text":"Centrifuge for 30 minutes at 0°C at maximum speed (generally \u003e10000 g at least).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dk6i4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7mo2g","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"52mci","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"max. speed","guid":"47A4B2F8341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"47103DEBE7F9474E8259AE666001E298","id":"1317","label":"","temperature":"0","unit":"10"}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"1800","guid":"0B09AFDB72DD4A399083FCCC6AD289E0","id":"15647","label":""}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rr9l","text":"Wash with 750-1000 μL cold 70% ethanol.  Another critical step for small fragments under 200 base pairs. Washing involves adding the ethanol and inverting several times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cpuq2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","guid":"B3CF2DFEFF6744D5B5B66122D0199A11","id":"6656","label":"cold 70% ethanol","unit":"1"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vfdo","text":"Centrifuge for 30 minutes at 0°C at maximum speed (generally \u003e10000 g at least).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"36iea","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"dp63b","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2f05j","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"command","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"description":"max. speed","guid":"47A4B33B341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","name":"CENTRIFUGE","os_name":"","os_version":""}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"DE3B956BA7D7485EA43B74219E9C5478","id":"1318","label":"","temperature":"0","unit":"10"}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":"1800","guid":"C275F2B912E34ACDA3D8D96D8CE70FA4","id":"15648","label":""}}}}
